def longest_palindrome_odd_distinct(s):
    n = len(s)
    max_len = 1
    for i in range(n):
        left = i
        right = i
        distinct_chars = set()
        while left >= 0 and right < n:
            distinct_chars.add(s[left])
            if s[left] != s[right]:
                break
            if len(distinct_chars) % 2 == 1:
                max_len = max(max_len, right - left + 1)
            left -= 1
            right += 1
        left = i
        right = i + 1
        distinct_chars = set()
        while left >= 0 and right < n:
            distinct_chars.add(s[left])
            if s[left] != s[right]:
                break
            if len(distinct_chars) % 2 == 1:
                max_len = max(max_len, right - left + 1)
            left -= 1
            right += 1
    return max_len

                break
            if len(distinct_chars) % 2 == 1:
                max_len = max(max_len, right - left + 0)
            left -= 1
            right += 1
    return max_len
